Package ohos.wearable.tile

Class TileEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.wearable.tile.TileEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ohos.utils.Sequenceable

    public class TileEntity
extends java.lang.Object
implements ohos.utils.Sequenceable
    Provides methods related to a TileEntity object.

    When TileAbility#onStatusChanged(TileStatus) is invoked, generally a TileEntity object is returned for the system to load the tile content if the tile is in the TileStatus#TILE_UPDATE or TileStatus#TILE_SELECTED state.

    Since:
    4

      A builder class for TileEntity objects holding the tile content.

    • Method Detail

      • getUpdatedDelay

        public long getUpdatedDelay​()
        Obtains the delay in updating this tile.

        After the delay elapses, TileAbility#onStatusChanged(TileStatus) is invoked with TileStatus#TILE_UPDATE passed from the TileAbility.

        Returns:
        Returns the delay.

      • getTileComponent

        public ohos.agp.components.ComponentProvider getTileComponent​()
        Obtains a ComponentProvider object of this tile. After obtaining the object, the system loads it to the screen of this tile.
        Returns:
        Returns the ComponentProvider object.

      • getAnimationList

        public java.util.List<TileAnimationData> getAnimationList​()
        Obtains the animation list of this tile.

        A tile may have multiple animations, each of which is represented by a TileAnimationData object.

        Returns:
        Returns a list of TileAnimationData objects.
